pullrequest.title: Pose frame semantics: describe legacy behavior

content.raw:
I've added it to the sdformat readme in https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/514/readme-clarify-that-the-parser-is-named/diff

it's already on sdformat.org/spec: "The SDF version shown in the dropdown above defines the specification version. This version number may be different from the release version of libsdformat, which contains the C++ library used to parse SDF files."
content.html:
I've added it to the sdformat readme in https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/514/readme-clarify-that-the-parser-is-named/diff

it's already on sdformat.org/spec: "The SDF version shown in the dropdown above defines the specification version. This version number may be different from the release version of libsdformat, which contains the C++ library used to parse SDF files."
